title: Bishoujo Yuugekitai Battle Skipper (Battle Skipper)
synopsis: Despite the title, this is not a feature but the three-part OAV Battle Skipper (1995), which Takashi Watanabe directed before going on to Slayers.
characters: ['Ayanokouji, Reika', 'Izaki, Kanami', 'Sakaki, Shihoko', 'Shibusawa, Rie', 'Tachibana, Saori', 'Kitaouji, Sayaka']
voices: ['Inoue, Kikuko', 'Shiratori, Yuri', 'Miyamura, Yuko', 'Niiyama, Shiho', 'Nishimura, Chinami', 'Orikasa, Ai']
staff: [['Fukushima, Hiroyuki', ['Producer']], ['Watanabe, Takashi', ['Director']], ['Kamata, Hidemi', ['Script']], ['Inoue, Kikuko', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
